content.question: Which of the following developments most closely resembles the proposal made in Source 1?

choices.label: The migration of Afro-Caribbean people to the United States in the early twentieth century
The support for African Americans’ enlistment in the United States military during the Second World War
The movement to repatriate African Americans to Africa in the twentieth century
The support for Ghana’s independence by Black American leaders in the 1950s

content.answer: The movement to repatriate African Americans to Africa in the twentieth century

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
